headline: Gartner Identifies the Top Strategic Technology Trends for 2026
summary: ORLANDO, Fla., October 20, 2025--Gartner, Inc., a business and technology insights company, today announced its list of top strategic technology trends that organizations need to explore in 2026. Analysts presented their findings during Gartner IT Symposium/Xpo, taking place here through Thursday.

headline: Stellar Cyber Named Representative Vendor in Gartner® 2025 Hype Cycle™ for Security Operations
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., October 20, 2025--Stellar Cyber, the cybersecurity illumination company, today announced it has been recognized as a Representative Vendor in the 2025 Gartner® Hype Cycle™ for Security Operations under the Extended Detection and Response (XDR) category.
